price: 95. Ils dirent alors : « Par Allah ! Tu es toujours dans ton égarement d’autrefois. »
arabic: قَالُواْ تَٱللَّهِ إِنَّكَ لَفِي ضَلَٰلِكَ ٱلۡقَدِيمِ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: qālū tal-lahi innaka lafī ḍalālika al-qadīmi
